scenario_text.value:
So...you went back to our world, right? How
was it?
I mean, I was only there for a few hours.

Yeah, that’s fine. What was it like being
back?
(Now how should I answer that? Oh, I know!)

You mean, because of the news that we were
missing?

I don’t think they’ve even realized that
we’re gone yet, to be honest.
Oh... I see. That’s a little sad, huh?

Oh, uh, just kidding! C’mon, let’s hurry on
back, Takuma!

(It’s possible that Miu wants to be needed by
someone...)

(When she said that she didn’t want to go
back, I guess that wasn’t her true feelings.)

(Otherwise she wouldn’t say something like
that.)

(Wanting to be there for someone... Maybe
that feeling will help Miu move forward.)
